citation_details.title: Diagnostic ultrasound enhances, then reduces, exogenously induced brain activity of mice
citation_details.author: H Tan, DJ Griggs, L Chen, KA Culevski
citation_details.abstract: Transcranially delivered diagnostic ultrasound (tDUS) applied to the human brain can  modulate those brains such that they became more receptive to external stimulation relative to
citation_details.short_author: H Tan, DJ Griggs, L Chen, KA Culevski
